VARIABLES.NAME: READ_PERSONAL_INFORMATION
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: This permission allows the Application to view the user's personal information such as their name and birthday

VARIABLES.NAME: INVOKE_TELEGRAM_NOTIFICATIONS
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: This allows the Application to send notifications to the user to their Telegram Account through @IntellivoidBot

VARIABLES.NAME: READ_EMAIL_ADDRESS
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: This enables the Application to view the user's Email Address

VARIABLES.NAME: READ_TELEGRAM_CLIENT
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: This permission allows the Application to request information about the user's Telegram Client such as their Private Telegram ID (PTID), Username, Name and ID

VARIABLES.NAME: READ_TODO
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: This allows the Application to only access and read the user's Todo Tasks and Groups (Intellivoid Suite)

VARIABLES.NAME: MANAGE_TODO
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: This allows the Application to read and modify the user's todo Tasks and Groups (Intellivoid Suite)

VARIABLES.NAME: SYNC_APPLICATION_SETTINGS
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: This allows the Application to sync it's variables and settings for users so that the Application doesn't need to store the user preferences for example in it's own database or file. The Application can store up to 16 MB of data in total

VARIABLES.NAME: READ_USERNAME
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: This allows the Application to view the users Username for Intellivoid Accounts, this is granted by default.

VARIABLES.NAME: GET_USER_DISPLAY
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: This allows the Application to get the user's public permalinks for their avatar (user display picture), this is granted by default

VARIABLES.NAME: INVOKE_PURCHASES
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: Allows the user to make purchases with this Application, this feature is only available to Intellivoid.

VARIABLES.NAME: EDIT_PERSONAL_INFORMATION
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: Allows the Application to edit the user's personal information, this feature is only available to Intellivoid.
